data.name: 0000 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04Accident Occurred!

data.name: 0001 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: An "Accident" is a compulsory penalty event.

data.name: 0002 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: They occur when Haruhi Suzumiya arrives at a red accident point…

data.name: 0003 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: …on the Haruhi Route on the top screen.

data.name: 0004 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: When an Accident occurs, the time limit will be decreased substantially.

data.name: 0005 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: There are two ways to avoid Accidents.

data.name: 0006 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04１. Acquire the corresponding "Main Topic."

data.name: 0007 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04"Topic" is a general term for a keyword or item that serves to distract Haruhi...

data.name: 0008 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04...or temporarily hinder her progression.

data.name: 0009 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04You can obtain them in events that occur during the story, depending on your…

data.name: 0010 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04…Brigade member allotment. By allotting your Brigade members in different ways, you will…

data.name: 0011 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04…have the opportunity to acquire various differing topics.

data.name: 0012 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04There are four types of Topics.

data.name: 0013 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04"Main Topics" concern the story—

data.name: 0014 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04"Haruhi Topics" concern the individual characteristics of Haruhi Suzumiya—

data.name: 0015 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04"Character Topics" concern the individual characteristics of the SOS Brigade members—

data.name: 0016 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04And "Sub-topics" are snippets of casual conversations. That concludes the four types.

data.name: 0017 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04Among these, acquiring the Main Topic...

data.name: 0018 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04...will allow you to automatically evade the corresponding Accident.

data.name: 0019 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04２. Using a Haruhi Topic.

data.name: 0020 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04Depending on Kyon's actions in the scene following group member selection...

data.name: 0021 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04...you may acquire a Haruhi Topic. In that case…

data.name: 0022 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04…you can use it on an Accident that would normally be unstoppable without a Main Topic…

data.name: 0023 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04…and forcibly evade it.

data.name: 0024 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04However, the Haruhi Topic is more difficult to obtain than the others…

data.name: 0025 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04…so please think carefully before using them.

data.name: 0026 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04To compensate, the only Topics that will carry over between episodes...

data.name: 0027 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04...are Haruhi Topics.

data.name: 0028 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04If there's nothing you can do to evade an Accident, there's another available tactic.

data.name: 0029 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04Using a Topic at an event point on the Haruhi Route...

data.name: 0030 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04...will trigger a Delay Event.

data.name: 0031 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04By presenting a Topic keyword to Haruhi Suzumiya...

data.name: 0032 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04...it is possible to distract and delay her for a short time.

data.name: 0033 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04The time it can delay her for depends on the details of the Topic and the combination of…

data.name: 0034 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04…members grouped with Haruhi, but in general the order is as follows:

data.name: 0035 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04Haruhi Topic--Large time limit increase.

data.name: 0036 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04Character Topic--Ordinary time limit increase.

data.name: 0037 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04Sub-Topic--Small time limit increase.

data.name: 0038 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04Haruhi Topics also have the ability to negate Accidents…

data.name: 0039 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04…but by using them to delay her, you can drastically increase the time limit.

data.name: 0040 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04Try to get as many topics as you can in the Investigation Phase…

data.name: 0041 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04…in order to increase your options in the Puzzle Phase.

data.name: 0042 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04The number of Topics you obtain and your response to choices are both important, but...

data.name: 0043 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04…allotting Brigade members is most important.

data.name: 0044 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04Please identify the characteristics of each member and after thinking carefully...

data.name: 0045 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04...distribute them according to what each is well-suited for.

data.name: 0046 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04The behavior of the members who don't accompany Kyon are also important factors.

data.name: 0047 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: #P04Try distributing group members in various ways and find out which combos work best!
